long_description: Keep food close during endurance rides and races with the Nathan Hyper SpeedFeed Box, which uses a quick-latch magnet closure for easy, single-handed access to energy food. Simple 3-point mounting system allows for a quick fit onto virtually any bike frame. Clear top flap for visibility of items inside box. Easy-clean lining for quick post-race clean up. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Keep food close during endurance rides and races with the Nathan Hyper SpeedFeed Box, which uses a quick-latch magnet closure for easy, single-handed access to energy food.
